title: Juprince
author: Juprince
content: Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcoin Forum.Sure, just check out a few of these few threads I have gathered for you. The replies have various pieces of advice and links to guides that can help you learn more about bitcoin.1. I'm new guy in Crypto World2. I need technical help and advice3. I'm new here, I need to know BTC4. Just a fresh beginner.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Let me brief it for you. But there are too many newbie questions of I am new here these days. Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.msg7955645#msg7955645Forum ranks/positions/badges (What do those shiny coins under my name mean?): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178608.msg1861412#msg1861412Merit & new rank requirements: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2818350.msg28856522#msg28856522Go to beginners & help and Meta board and read the remaining threads that are pinned there.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. You are welcome to bitcointalk ones again. This is the right forum where you will understand many things about cryptocurrency and also bitcoin itself, as well as other aspects of bitcoin, including the technical aspects. As I can see from your write-up, you are ready to learn, and in this forum, many high-ranking members are always ready to teach and answer any of your questions. I will encourage you not to hesitate in asking questions because anyone who engages in research will never fail.So far, I have seen that you have been provided with some links to learn and understand more, but I will also add up some links that will help you during your stay here in the forum. These links will be listed below.You can click Newbies read before posting it will guide on how to operate on the forum. And also I recommend  Beginners encyclopedia for you

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome mate and and congratulations for joining the forum, honestly it's not different from your usual group so don't be pressured, first get familiar with the rules and regulations of the forum so that it can guide you here and help you from not getting banned.Also the forum already have room for newbies to grow that's why you can find pinned messages it's pinned there for people like you to read and get guide. Read them so you can have a specific question to ask so you can get more information.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome mate, You have successfully found the most lucrative and educative community when it comes to Bitcoin and other crypto knowledge that's if course you came because of acquiring more knowledge. Although they're other benefits involved in the community but it's first best you understand and follow up with how things are being done here and in other for that I would advise you to start reading because thats the best way to learn since you can't contribute and offer what you don't actually have upstairs.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Welcome Op, you're in the right place, and believe me you will find the right knowledge that you are seeking if you dedicate your time to learning and also put some effort into doing some research. At this beginning stage, I advise you to do more reading than you contribute, with this method you will get to learn and know more things about Bitcoin from the the experience members we have on this platform.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome to this amazing forum where you can learn everything about Bitcoin from the users who have enough knowledge about Bitcoin and they're always ready to help anyone who sincerely wants to learn about it. I recommend you to browse the forum and read each thread that can teach you something about the things that you want to learn. It's always better to read the pinned up posts of each board as those posts are highly informative and can be very valuable for beginners. You should also try to spend some time to read threads in Beginners & Help board as that's the most important board for beginners who want to get proper understanding about Bitcoin and other then that I also recommend you to read threads in Bitcoin discussion so that you can get deeper understanding about Bitcoin.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Welcome to the cryptocurrency university. The forum is like a crypto university, where you can learn everything related to crypto. For that, you have to read a lot and participate in the discussion. As a beginner, follow the suggestions advised by the above replies. Help keep this forum clean by avoiding unnecessary threads; for that, you have to use the forum search button. Find your local board for a better understanding of this forum.

comments.author: 2Pizza410000BTC
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Thanks for visiting the Bitcoin Forum. Here you will get all the help you need for counseling and you will never get stuck. But my advice to you would be to stick with it and give it enough time. Whenever you spend enough time here and take help from experts I think you will learn something good. If you have a lot of ambition, you will definitely learn something good. But remember one thing don't try to cheat here cheating will never set you free.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Welcome OP. It is nice you found yourself here. I know and believe that you  would not regret your time here. As you have already been told, this platform is an institution and all that hovers around Bitcoin and Crypto can be found here. This platform made of different people from different walks and works of life who find themselves here and are willing to share their knowledge and experience with members to teaching and guiding them all through till they gain the appropriate knowledge about the Crypto space.I see some members already shared some links to vital information you could learn from about Bitcoin. I will urge you to read them as well and also watch explanatory videos about Bitcoin and crypto currency and how it works. This would give you more insight on how to go about your activities while doing anything as it relates to crypto and Bitcoin.

comments.author: zaim7413
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum.Look, how enthusiastic the seniors are in guiding, directing and making it easier to find answers to your questions. The seniors are very friendly to newbies who have just joined the forum, they will try to answer questions with answers that can lead to better results. Continue reading all the links attached here, some of which will direct you to knowledge about Bitcoin and forum rules that should be avoided.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: OP, you are welcome to the forum. You should take your time to read more and do your own research to improve your knowledge. Make sure that you don't plagiarize, because it is a great offense here that will lead to account ban. If you must use someone else's work for reference, you should add the link to it.Take your time to navigate round the forum and see boards of your interest where you can contribute easily on topic discussed. You should also engage yourself in discussions here in the forum. The search engine is the key to whatever that you are looking for and don't forget to ask questions that you are confused about. The forum is a very good place to learn and have new friends. Try to add value and positive impact on the forum and forum members by being creative.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Oh,,he Mr. OP, welcome to this bitcoin forum as you are a newbie, so maybe you don't know much about the forum. Also, you can get good education from the person who brought you here, and definitely get good results from him. I think if you stick with bitcoin forum for a long time, you can definitely get good experience about bitcoin and understand about cryptocurrency world from here. Moreover, if you have difficulty in understanding, then you must go to your local board and discuss there, they will explain you best in your own language. Already many of you have given many guidelines about newbies which you can learn good things if you observe, I am also giving you some guidelines follow them and you will be wise.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461480.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5468918https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5471925https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462991.0

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome to the forum, the links provided by other members in this thread are more than enough to help you start your journey. There is no end to learning, so I encourage you to remain curious and inquisitive so as to make the best of your time here. Bitcointalk is a very interesting place and it’s easy to get attached to the forum. It may look complicated at first but it won’t take long before you understand the forum.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, a place where you can find the perfect solution to all your Bitcoin-related questions.Many users have already provided you with some important links, which include the forum guidelines and some important threads that will answer all your questions, both the ones you have asked and the ones you have yet to voice.I will add Leranmeabitcoin.com for easy interpretation of Bitcoin and blockchain concepts, Bitcoin key and address, basic understanding of Bitcoin transactions, and lots more.Because of question like this, @Ratimov has created an Encyclopedia for beginners like you and any other members to make some researches and gain knowledge that can help them in the Bitcoin world.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: You're highly welcome OP, I guess you are in the right place to learn so many things that will help you to rank up in the forum but don't forget to meditate the rules and regulations that governed this forum so that you can enjoy the full benefits of Bitcointalk.org forum, where people are willing to help newbies to learn anything that related to BTC and crypto and, also teach them when to buy and hold in your wallet and when to release them from your wallet to the market which are very important for newbies to know all those things to ensure they succeed in the future. Don't forget to ask questions on something you don't understand, if truly you are willing to stay in this forum long and become a good posters because, the more you ask questions the more you get to understand so many things that will improve you in the community.

comments.author: JunaidAzizi
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guidance, thanks in advance. Welcome to this forum, glad to see one more person adding to this forum... A lot of people came to his forum and started working but at the beggainer stage they were posting about how to earn money on this plate forum, yeah asking about this is not prohibited at this forum but before going to money why you are not asking about the work here the. rules and norms.So it's very good for you to ask about the guidance and knowledge about the forum work. I am giving you the link of two threads here go and check it out.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.msg7955645#msg7955645 This link includes the rules of this forum with explanations and examples and also with FAQ.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2818350.msg28856522#msg28856522This thread is about the merits sharing and rank system which will guided more at this forum.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Welcome to the forum.I have seen that so many senior members of this forum has sent you articles that you will read to understand how to succeed in the forum. I will advise you to read those articles at your leisure. Also try as much as possible to be active in this forum and also you should learn how to use the search button. So many questions you will have to ask have already been asked and answered before in the forum. So to avoid repetition, use the search button, search for your question and read different answers given in the thread. If you are still not convinced, you can decide to create a new topic.Firstly, remember to read and abide by the rules of the forum. Congratulations

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Juprince on October 29, 2023, 01:26:15 PM     Hi I'm new here , before I was wondering what is Bitcoin an I'm very thankful to those person who help me to learn some things but I want more knowledge an some guide, thanks in advance. Every day there will definitely be a beginner who, after registration, rushes to ask such questions, without even bothering to find answers on his own, which are available in abundance on the forum. You need to re-read the topics in the "Beginners & Help" section, and you will undoubtedly find answers to your questions.
